item.title: Christy add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "Happiness is a warm puppy." -- Charles M. Schulz

item.title: Christy add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Get busy living or get busy dying." -- Stephen King

item.title: Christy add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Go then, there are other worlds than these." -- Stephen King

item.title: Christy add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "It was a full moon and, shining on all the snow, it made everything almost as bright as day -- only the shadows were rather confusing." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Christy add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "the year she had run fleetly through the dewy grass under the moon- the night of wine, when dreams condensed out of thin air like the nightmilk of fantasy." -- Stephen King

item.title: Christy add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Just go on dancing with me like this forever and I'll never tire. We'll scrape our shoe on the stars and hang upside down from the moon." -- Stephen King

item.title: Christy add a quote by Stephen King
Christy add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "O, swear not by the moon, the fickle moon, the inconstant moon, that monthly changes in her circle orb, Lest that thy love prove likewise variable" -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Christy add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Do not swear by the moon, for she changes constantly. then your love would also change." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Christy add a quote by Shel Silverstein
Christy add a quote by Frances Hodgson Burnett
item.description: "Is the spring coming?" he said. "What is it like?"... "It is the sun shining on the rain and the rain falling on the sunshine..." -- Frances Hodgson Burnett
